document_data.name: ''Swiresy Shoes''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Swiresy shoes''''' were [[magic]]al [[boots]] that were likely created in tribute to the infamous diminutive vaulting [[thief]] named [[Lupperdiddle Swires]].
document_data.Powers: The wearer of these boots became an expert vaulter, making their jumps {{SI|5'|'"|long=yes}} longer and higher. Additionally, they magically improved the wearer's skills in acrobatics.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, ''Swiresy shoes'' were in possession of [[Grat]], a merchant of [[Cult of the Absolute]] who traded at the [[Shattered Sanctum]]. The boots were among many other spoils of cultist raids on the communities and locations in the [[Chionthar Vallery]].
